mapper.select: SELECT WI.IMGURL AS surfaceImageUrl, WCT.CONTENT_SUMMARY contentSummary, WCT.CONTENT_TITLE contentTitle, WCT.SUBTITLE subTitle, WS.ID AS contentUrlName FROM WEB_COLUMCONFIG WC LEFT JOIN WEB_CONTENT_COLUM WCC ON WC.ID=WCC.COLUMNID LEFT JOIN WEB_CONTENT WCT ON WCC.CONTENTID=WCT.ID LEFT JOIN WEB_IMAGE WI ON WI.IMAGE_ID=WCT.SURFACE_IMAGEID LEFT JOIN WEB_SKIPPATH WS ON WCT.ID=WS.CONTENTID WHERE WC.ID = #{userId} AND WCT.CONTENT_TITLE like concat('%','${queryKey}','%') ORDER BY WCT.RELEASE_TIME DESC
